description.value: You found this in a horrible place filled with vines, bones, sap, an unholy altar. It doesn't even look tasty.

gm-notes.notes:
Eating this is bad.

One bite
: Fall into coma [[/r 1d4]] hours and experience a @RollTable[Blessings of the Slow God]{Blessing of the Slow God}

Two bites
: Fall into coma [[/r 1d3]] years. No mundane or magical method will awaken them before this

Three bites
: Fall into coma for decades. Be forgotten by all and lost. Return as an agent of the Slow God
